feed.title: Category: Uncategorized | A Coding Monkey's Blog

entry.title: Trac's milestone feature is helpful to track the progress
entry.content: I have used several project management software before. But today I found that the milestone feature in Trac very impressive. At the beginning of a project I can file all the tasks, to-dos, required features to the issue tracking system for a specific milestone. By viewing the progress bar, I can have a clear big picture about the progress of the project. I like this feature very much. Very helpful.
